alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:42PM EST until January 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Along with the additional snow accumulation, gusty wind will blow snow onto roads and further hamper clearance efforts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
